picks.text: Apple announces a new Mac Pro powered by Apple Silicon
picks.full-pick-text: Apple announces a new Mac Pro powered by Apple Silicon

picks.text: The iPad mini does receive the new design language
picks.full-pick-text: The iPad mini does receive the new design language
picks.notes: • "Originally, Stephen said it would not receive it", but the other hosts criticized him for his negativity.

picks.text: Apple launches at least one iPad model with a new display technology
picks.full-pick-text: Apple launches at least one iPad model with a new display technology
picks.notes: • He initially picked mini LED specifically. And after further discussion it was agreed that this meant a new display technology for the iPad, so for example OLED would also count.

picks.text: iOS 15 gives users more home screen customization options
picks.full-pick-text: iOS 15 gives users more home screen customization options
picks.notes:
• Specifically not iPadOS 15.
  • This was granted but the customization options were not extensive, just turning on and off home screens, both manually and with focus modes.

picks.text: No in-person WWDC 2021
picks.full-pick-text: No in-person WWDC 2021

picks.text: Apple launches 'AirTags' accessories for tracking physical objects
picks.full-pick-text: Apple launches 'AirTags' accessories for tracking physical objects
picks.notes: • The name was allowed to be different, but Federico nailed it.

picks.text: A Mac gets a screen that supports touch and/or Apple Pencil input
picks.full-pick-text: A Mac gets a screen that supports touch and/or Apple Pencil input
picks.notes: • Myke was torn between this and "iPad multitasking is overhauled again", but elected to make the more passionate pick.

picks.text: Apple has Apple Silicon versions of all of its Intel Macs on sale by the end of 2021
picks.full-pick-text: Apple has Apple Silicon versions of all of its Intel Macs on sale by the end of 2021
picks.notes:
• "No Intel Macs are available for sale without an Apple Silicon counterpart." Myke points out the iMac Pro as a potential spoiler.
  • (For pick complexity purposes, I'm counting this as 1 condition for each Mac line that still had no Apple Silicon counterpart at the beginning of 2021: The larger MacBook Pros, the iMac in both sizes, the iMac Pro, and the Mac Pro. The Mac mini is 1 line with a high end and low end, so it already had an "Apple Silicon counterpart" although the high end Mac mini was still Intel.)
  • The iMac Pro left the lineup entirely, but the Mac Pro remained on Intel for about a year and a half more.

picks.text: Apple will release a new programming app for iPad
picks.full-pick-text: Apple will release a new programming app for iPad
picks.notes:
• Federico asks to be quoted as "very very positive" that he will win on the strength of this Ricky Pick.
  • Not Swift Playgrounds, that is not new. As it turns out, they added this functionality to Swift Playgrounds.
  • This was deemed not a reuse of a previous pick since it is even riskier and more specific.

picks.text: Another variant of over-ear headphones will be released
picks.full-pick-text: Another variant of over-ear headphones will be released
picks.notes: • Technically Apple wasn't specified, but of course that wasn't the intent.

picks.text: Apple releases a weather API
picks.full-pick-text: Apple releases a weather API
picks.notes: • The revamped weather API was announced at WWDC in 2022.

picks.text: New Apple TV released
picks.full-pick-text: New Apple TV released

picks.text: iPad multitasking is overhauled again
picks.full-pick-text: iPad multitasking is overhauled again

picks.text: A new iMac has adjustability that is reminiscent of the Pro Display XDR
picks.full-pick-text: A new iMac has adjustability that is reminiscent of the Pro Display XDR

picks.text: Apple releases its own game controller
picks.full-pick-text: Apple releases its own game controller

picks.text: iOS gets a native feature to change icons for any app you want
picks.full-pick-text: iOS gets a native feature to change icons for any app you want

picks.text: Apple releases a bigger iPad Pro
picks.full-pick-text: Apple releases a bigger iPad Pro

picks.text: At least one new iPhone model has both Face ID and Touch ID
picks.full-pick-text: At least one new iPhone model has both Face ID and Touch ID

picks.text: WidgetKit will support new widget sizes and more interactivity
picks.full-pick-text: WidgetKit will support new widget sizes and more interactivity
picks.notes: • The boolean operator "and" ends up taking this pick down, as interactivity wouldn't come until 2023.

picks.text: Apple puts a cheaper display on sale as a sibling to the XDR
picks.full-pick-text: Apple puts a cheaper display on sale as a sibling to the XDR

picks.text: There will be a chip named M1 followed by a letter
picks.full-pick-text: There will be a chip named M1 followed by a letter

picks.text: The new iPhone will be the 12S, not the 13
picks.full-pick-text: The new iPhone will be the 12S, not the 13

picks.text: Apple ships an AR, VR, and/or MR dedicated device
picks.full-pick-text: Apple ships an AR, VR, and/or MR dedicated device

picks.text: No Mac gets a cellular data option
picks.full-pick-text: No Mac gets a cellular data option

picks.text: The iPod Touch will be cancelled
picks.full-pick-text: The iPod Touch will be cancelled
picks.notes:
• The other hosts question the word "cancelled" here.
  • Finally came true in 2022.
